title: League Still Won't opem
body:
I'll open league of legends alpha client but it will just stay on the huge black box with the loading L in the middle to load the launcher for an indefinite amount of time.
 When i try to open the Legacy client i will click on the orange launch button and nothing will happen and the launch button will go back to orange.
 Thoughts?

replies.body: It sucks to hear that this has still been a problem.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you individually on this.  Grab some logs as well through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to the ticket so we have better context.  We'll reply back to your ticket as soon as we can!
Oops i forgot to attach the logs to the ticket {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
